sentences.cn: 别把那只箱子抛入水中.

sentences.en: He fell overboard and was drowned.
sentences.cn: 他从船上掉在水里淹死了.

sentences.en: He had jumped overboard in New York harbor and swum to shore.
sentences.cn: 他在纽约港跳下船，游上了岸。

sentences.en: He seems to have thrown all his principles overboard.
sentences.cn: 他似乎放弃了所有的原则.

sentences.en: He's overboard for the new TV series.
sentences.cn: 他对新的电视连续剧着了迷.

sentences.en: His sailing instructor fell overboard and drowned during a lesson.
sentences.cn: 他的航海教练在一次训练课时从船上失足跌入水中，溺水身亡。

sentences.en: His sailing instructor fell overboard and nearly drowned during a lesson.
sentences.cn: 他的帆船教练在一次课上落水，差点溺死。

sentences.en: In a fit of bad temper, Dougie threw the deep fat fryer overboard.
sentences.cn: 一气之下，道吉把那个又深又大的油炸锅扔了。

sentences.en: Man overboard (= said when someone falls off a boat )!
One error and he would have been torn loose and hurled overboard by the squalling wind.
sentences.cn: 稍出差错,咆哮的狂风就会把他扯开,从船上拋入水中.

sentences.en: One of the crew fell overboard and drowned.
sentences.cn: 有一个船员从船上落水淹死了。

sentences.en: She fell overboard and was drowned.
sentences.cn: 她从船上掉入水中淹死了.

sentences.en: The crew threw everything movable overboard to lighten the plane.
sentences.cn: 为了减轻飞机重量,机上的人员把一切可以移动的东西都扔出机舱.

sentences.en: The sailors hove [ heaved ] the anchor overboard.
sentences.cn: 那些水手们把锚 ( 自船上 ) 投入海中.

sentences.en: The sailors hove the anchor overboard.
sentences.cn: 那些水手们把锚投入海中.

sentences.en: They had thrown their neutrality overboard in the crisis.
sentences.cn: 他们在这场危机中丢弃了中立立场。

sentences.en: What do you think causes the police to go overboard, to use excessive violence?
sentences.cn: 你认为是什么原因导致警察行为过激，滥用暴力？

sentences.en: Women sometimes damage their skin by going overboard with abrasive cleansers.
sentences.cn: 女性有时因过度使用磨砂膏而损伤了皮肤。

phrases.tran_cn: 走极端，尤指由激情引起地

trans.tran_cn: 极其热心的；全身心投入的
越过船边坠入水中，裁员
trans.tran_en: over the side of a ship or boat into the water
